question: Which two steps in the service-profit chain model are related and directly linked?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Internal service quality (Step 1) and increased profitability and growth (Step 6) are not related and directly linked in the service-profit chain model.
That’s not correct. Value (Step 4) and customer satisfaction (Step 5) are not related and directly linked in the service-profit chain model.
That’s not correct. Internal service quality (Step 1) and value (Step 4) are not related and directly linked in the service-profit chain model.

answers.text: Internal service quality and increased productivity and growth

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: According to the model, customer satisfaction (Step 5) and customer loyalty (Step 6) are related and directly linked.

detailedSolution: According to the model, customer satisfaction (Step 5) and customer loyalty (Step 6) are related and directly linked.
